title: The Annotated Plays of  William Shakespeare   (PDF)
description:
The Annotated Shakespeare - Three Volumes In One Book

(Photocopy of book in PDF Format)


Publisher: Greenwich House | ISBN: 0517665557 | edition 1998 | PDF | 2462 pages | 175 mb



Illustrated and with margin annotations.

Includes the comedies, the histories, the tragedies, the romances, the sonnets and other poems.

Edited, with introductions, notes, a biography and bibliography by A.L. Rowse.


For those, like me, who want an ebook version of Shakespeare with margin annotations, this is the best I can find.

The book has been photocopied but is perfectly acceptable quality and this is a small price to pay for having an annotated copy of these masterpieces.


Enjoy and Seed!!
